name: msi-keyboard-gui
description: The First fully featured GUI MSI Keyboard controller for Linux (And Windows)
author: Steve Lacy <me@slacy.me> http://slacy.me

scripts.build:linux: npm run build:app:linux && electron-packager ./dist/app/ --overwrite --out=dist --electron-version=1.8.8 --platform=linux --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id=com.stevelacy.msikeyboard --app-version=$npm_package_version && cd dist/ && tar -czvf ./msi-keyboard-gui-linux-${npm_package_version}.tar.gz msi-keyboard-gui-linux-x64/*
scripts.build:windows: npm run build:app:windows && electron-packager ./dist/app/ --overwrite --out=dist --electron-version=1.7.8 --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id=com.stevelacy.msikeyboard --app-version=%npm_package_version% && cd dist/
scripts.build:macos: npm run build:app:macos && electron-packager ./dist/app/ --overwrite --out=dist --electron-version=1.8.4 --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id=com.stevelacy.msikeyboard --app-version=%npm_package_version% && cd dist/
scripts.build:app:linux: npm rebuild --runtime=electron --target=1.8.8 --disturl=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --npm_config_build_from_source=true && babel src/ --out-dir ./dist/app/src/ && cp -t ./dist/app/src/ ./src/index.html ./src/index.css && cp -rt ./dist/app/ index.js package.json node_modules LICENSE
scripts.build:app:windows: npm rebuild --runtime=electron --target=1.8.8 --disturl=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --npm_config_build_from_source=true && babel src/ --out-dir .\dist\app\src\ && copy .\src\index.html .\dist\app\src\ && copy .\src\index.css .\dist\app\src\ && copy index.js .\dist\app\ && copy package.json .\dist\app\ && xcopy .\node_modules .\dist\app\node_modules\ /e/i/h/y/a && copy LICENSE .\dist\app\
scripts.build:app:macos: npm rebuild --runtime=electron --target=1.8.8 --disturl=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --npm_config_build_from_source=true && babel src/ --out-dir ./dist/app/src/ && cp ./src/index.html ./src/index.css ./dist/app/src/  && rm -rf ./dist/app/node_modules && cp -R index.js package.json node_modules LICENSE ./dist/app/
